control.name: checkedListBoxControl1
control.description: Lists the view's display options. These options can be accessed via the view's OptionsView property. The ItemCheck event is handled to enable or disable the option which corresponds to the item whose checked state has been changed.

control.name: checkedListBoxControl2
control.description: Lists the view's behaviour options. These options can be accessed via the view's OptionsBehavior property. The ItemCheck event is handled to enable or disable the option which corresponds to the item whose checked state has been changed.
